title: Plugin-based Auth Architecture
text: Design plugins for token generation, validation, and refresh supporting JWT, opaque tokens, and mTLS claims. Include phased migration and dual validation during rollout.

title: SLO/SLA Guardrails
text: Track P95 latency and error rate for auth endpoints. Use canary rollouts and automated rollback when thresholds are breached.

title: Testing Auth Layers
text: Unit tests for token parsing, integration tests for middleware, and end-to-end tests for login flows with synthetic users.

title: SOC 2 Controls Mapping
text: Security, Availability, Integrity, Confidentiality, Privacy. Emphasize logging, RBAC, backups, and change management.

title: ISO 27001 ISMS Overview
text: Risk management, incident response, asset inventory, supplier security, and continuous improvement.

title: HIPAA Basics
text: Privacy Rule, Security Rule, and Breach Notification with audit trails for PHI access.

title: SAP S/4HANA Cutover Plan
text: Freeze changes, code and customizing transports, data migration rehearsal, downtime window, backout plan, post-cutover hypercare.

title: RICEFW Governance
text: Track Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements, Forms, and Workflows via change control, test gates, and transport sequencing.

title: SAP Authorizations & SoD
text: Design PFCG roles with least privilege, mitigate Segregation of Duties risks, firefighter access, periodic recertification, and audit evidence.

title: IDoc Monitoring & Retry
text: Set up WE02/WE05 dashboards, alerts for stuck IDocs, reprocessing strategy, partner profiles, status management, and error handling patterns.

title: Fiori Governance & Performance
text: Catalogs/groups, app whitelisting, launchpad performance (cache buster, CDN), OData throttling, and SSO integration.

title: BW/4HANA & S/4 Integration
text: ODP extractors, SLT replication, data reconciliation controls, delta handling, and data lineage for analytics.

title: SAP BTP CAP Service Hardening
text: CAP multi-tenant security, XSUAA scopes/roles, Destination service, connectivity, rate limits, and circuit breakers; blue-green deploy on Cloud Foundry.

title: Event Mesh Reliability
text: Event Mesh queues/topics, QoS, dead-letter strategy, retry policy, idempotency keys, and consumer scaling.

title: BTP API Management Governance
text: Policies: spike arrest, quota, API key/JWT, IP allowlists, masking, audit logging; lifecycle via CTMS.

title: Kyma Multi-Region DR
text: Kyma clusters across regions, HPA/VPA, backup/restore, traffic failover, and config drift detection.

title: CPI Observability
text: Integration Suite (CPI) monitoring, traceability, alerting rules, error categories, and retry/backoff.
